name: Golden Goose (Jaan Valjaan)
description:
Build defences on snow and destroy 3 waves of incoming enemies to win. If they get to all of your golden eggs before that, you'll be forced to declare bankruptcy.

This is a mobile game made as a university project. Developed with Unity. (For Apple iPhone 11's screen. I don't know how it looks like on any android phone.) I might develop it further in the future and for additional platforms.

Credits:
Development - Jaan Huntsaar
Support - Keron "The Helpful Lecturer" Sepp
Free cow asset - Cow by Poly by Google [CC-BY] via Poly Pizza
